amendment.description: Amendment sought to insert an exception for any rule pertaining to air quality or water quality.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 113-361 to exempt any rule pertaining to air quality or water quality.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 235 (Roll no. 72).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Connolly.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 235 (Roll no. 72).
